description: The PAT_ENC_DOSNG_OVR table contains the dosing instructions for individual days (such as holds, changes to doses for a day, missed doses, wrong doses taken) for anticoagulation patients when using the calendar based tracking section.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_DATE
columns.description: Date for which a daily correction is specified (may be a held dose, dose change to instructions, missed dose, wrong dose taken or comment)

columns.name: OVERRIDE_DOSE
columns.description: Override dose for the day (dose change or wrong dose taken)

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PILL_SIZE
columns.description: Override pill size for the day (dose change)

columns.name: OVERRIDE_NO_OF_PILL
columns.description: Override number of pills for the day (dose change)

columns.name: HOLD_DOSE_YN
columns.description:
This column will store a boolean Yes/No about whether the patient was instructed to hold their dose for the day.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DOSE_MISSED_YN
columns.description:
This column will store a boolean Yes/No about whether the patient missed their dose for the day.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HOLD_DOSE_YN

columns.name: UNDO_CORRECTION_YN
columns.description:
This item will be used to undo the correction day. Setting this item to Yes will ignore this correction from being displayed on calendar.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HOLD_DOSE_YN

columns.name: WRONG_DOSE_TAKEN_YN
columns.description:
This item will store a boolean Yes/No about whether the patient took the wrong dose


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HOLD_DOSE_YN

columns.name: OVERRIDE_PILL_SIZE2
columns.description: Second override pill size for the day (dose change)

columns.name: OVERRIDE_NO_OF_PIL2
columns.description: Second override number of pills for the day (dose change)
